Articles.Content:
[http://kotaku.com/best-to-start-them-early-redditor-pypok-and-his-wife-n-1692341115](https://kotaku.com/best-to-start-them-early-redditor-pypok-and-his-wife-n-1692341115)

I am horribly horribly saddened... that my room doesn't look like this. And I'm 40.

Anyway, another post about kerbs in the news that I didn't see linked here. Enjoy it everyone ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)
Lucky, lucky kid ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Space themed room...and parents willing to nurture his\her imagination in such a cool way.
hot damn, i wish my room was cooler
That looks cute. I wonder if the one being pushed by the rocket is jeb, because that is a face of ecstasy.
Aww, so cool. Wish it was my bedroom!
I am going to buy that house, one way or another!

> 
> That's taking it too far.

Nonsense! All praise and glory be to Jebediah, our holy lord and savior of the true light and dark of the cosmos.
I'm sensing nightmare fuel here. Especially for a baby/small child.
